attributes.action: Actually do something, not words, not lies, just positive actions that can be seen by all, and not swept under the carpet or ignored or reviewed etc etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please bring back the death penalty and have real prison sentences, Please come out of the human rights treaty, Please actually do something worthwhile about the scumbags that are murdering, stealing stabbing/shooting people (ie death penalty). Please cancel the olympics and spend all of OUR money on something worthwhile and needed, ie national health, education, affordable housing. Please stop screwing over the british public (ie extorntionate fuel prices, perscriptions, etc etc)

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for specific action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
